content.reservation_caption: Walk‑ins are welcome when seats are available.
content.concept_bar_subtitle: pretending to be a coffee shop
content.concept_coffee_description:
Forget time.
Stop measuring.
Don't compare with others.
Relax and
forget your daily routine.
A place where you can
enjoy coffee and the extraordinary
without thinking about anything.
That is 'JANAI COFFEE'.
content.concept_bar_description:
America in the 1920s when Prohibition was in effect.
During that era, a culture called 'speakeasy'
was born and became popular, where alcohol was
sold secretly behind the guise of beauty salons
and law offices.
JANAI COFFEE has adopted
this speakeasy system to create
'a place where only people who find
the concept interesting gather'.
(Of course, it's legal, so please rest assured.)
content.drink_coffee_description: Our baristas select light‑ to medium‑roast specialty beans, choosing each origin to suit the season and every drink we serve.
content.drink_bar_description:
At first glance we're just a humble coffee stand.
But hidden behind the counter is a bar open only to those who've discovered this secret page.

Show this screen to any staff member and we'll usher you inside.

(Guests who can't present this page, or who are under the legal drinking age, will be refused entry.)
content.takeout_title:
Take it to go
and make your day wonderful.
content.takeout_description:
For guests watching their caffeine,
we always have decaf coffee ready.
content.menu_bar_description:
There's an image that you can't go to bars
unless you know a lot about alcohol.
We want to eliminate that image.
Actually, not all the staff at this store
are extremely knowledgeable about alcohol.
However,
this store has a lot of alcohol that
all the staff tasted and
chose together for fun.
Even if you're not knowledgeable, even if the taste is difficult,
the label is cute, the name is interesting,
please enjoy JANAI COFFEE
for such 'somehow' reasons.
By the way, reading the bar side page
vertically has no meaning.
